backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining feed items, profiles, comments, likes, and media handling with access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old actor state through unchanged to the new format with compatible type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/deploy/dfx-frontend-canister-as: Template showing proper dfx.json configuration for serving built frontend assets and validating deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to correctly build and serve the Vite frontend from the dist directory.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions and dark-mode variables for the app’s UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, and dev-time script reference to src/main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, and icons for installability.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, activate, and fetch events with cache versioning, static asset caching, and network-first or cache strategies while excluding backend calls.
frontend/scripts/deploy-frontend-prod.sh: Shell script that builds, verifies, and deploys the frontend to the Internet Computer, including post-deploy checks and output of the live canister URL.
frontend/scripts/verify-dist-shell.ts: Node script validating Vite build output by checking index.html references and required static files in dist before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend-caniste: Node script verifying dfx.json frontend canister configuration, ensuring it serves dist assets and is correctly typed and linked.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication state, service worker updates, PIN challenges, and routing to setup or feed UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state with loading UI and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup form allowing new users to submit their name via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/capture/VideoCap: Implements a video capture interface using MediaRecorder, handling camera setup, recording, errors, and returning the recorded file.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Provides a comment input with optional image/video upload, validation, upload progress, and submission via a mutation hook.
Renders threaded comments with likes, media attachments, reply handling, and deletion support.
Displays a full-screen comments panel with sorting, loading states, and a composed list and composer for a feed item.
frontend/src/components/editor/MediaEdit: Offers an editing dialog for images and videos supporting filters, text overlay, cropping, trimming, and applying edits before returning a new file.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItem.ts: Displays a single feed post with video/image playback, like/comment/share actions, and state handling for interaction and visibility.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedOverlay: Renders overlay UI for a feed item including handle, caption, social actions, and optional video controls.
frontend/src/components/feed/Interaction: Provides like, comment, share, and download buttons for a feed item with authentication checks and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/PlayerSocia: Offers follow and subscribe buttons with simple local state toggles and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/feed/SpeedContro: Dropdown control allowing users to change video playback speed from preset options.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadButto: Button that opens the upload dialog, gated by user authentication.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadDialo: File upload dialog supporting image/video selection, validation, editing, capture, and progress-tracked uploads.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeed.t: Scrollable feed that loads posts, manages active item detection, deep-link navigation, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeedIt: Placeholder file exporting nothing to avoid build issues.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoOverla: Play/pause and mute controls displayed over a video feed item.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBut: Search button that opens the search dialog when clicked.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDia: Modal search UI with debounced text input, identity‑gated search, and interactive result selection.
frontend/src/components/security/PinChal: PIN verification dialog that tracks attempts, triggers success callback, and locks out after failures.
frontend/src/components/security/Securit: Button that opens the security setup dialog using a shield icon trigger.
Multi‑step dialog for creating a PIN and two security questions, saving them via useSecuritySetup.
Share dialog offering link copy and optional native share, with visual feedback on copy state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceTrust.ts: Manages a persistent device ID in localStorage and tracks whether a device is trusted.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Hook detecting double‑tap or double‑click gestures and invoking a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentityEx: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with support for external-browser login flows and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for feed fetching, media upload, and like toggling with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecuritySetup.ts: Manages local PIN and security questions storage with verification and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, mobile-safe layout rules, and scroll/viewport behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Fetches a URL as a blob and triggers a client-side file download.
frontend/src/utils/embeddedBrowser.ts: Detects embedded/in-app browser environments and determines if external redirects are supported.
frontend/src/utils/iiExternalReturn.ts: Handles external-browser Internet Identity login state, callback detection, nonce validation, and URL cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/mediaEdits.ts: Applies basic image edits via canvas and returns the edited file; video edits are stubbed to return the original file.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Generates shareable post URLs and provides clipboard and native share utility functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and fetch them from sessionStorage, and sync URL params to session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable plugins, path aliases, build options, and a dev proxy for API requests.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, listing implemented TikTok-style comment features and pending feature requests.
